sentences.sContent: His great achievement is to make all the players into a united team.
sentences.sCn: 他的伟大成就在于把所有选手组织成一支团结的队伍。

sentences.sContent: ...your generous help made it possible that I can gain a splendid academic achievement in my study career...
...it is because of your encouragement and continuous assistance that now I have obtained a splendid academic achievement in my study career...
...your continuous help have made me a splendid academic achievement in my study career...
...if you want to make achievement in social settings...
...Yet students showed no additional learning in achievement tests...
...Great achievement only belongs to those who can do small things perfectly...
...Even the strongest supporters of the reform movement concede that the task of raising achievement among disadvantaged students is hard work...
...His great achievement was to combine an emotional spark with computer technology...

remMethod.val: achieve(完成) ＋ ment(表行为)  → 完成； a(表加强) ＋ chieve  (看作chief， 主要部分) +ment→ 做好最主要的部分才算基本完成 → 完成

words.tran: 可完成的；可有成就的；做得成的

trans.tranOther: something important that you succeed in doing by your own efforts
